name: Gacha Club Mod but you dont have to delete Gacha club (not mine, belongs to sd232Id)

description:
This time this is for people who don't wanna get rid of gacha club to get this mod.

This was asked for.

Please don't rush me to do gacha art now i will get to it.

It will appear as gacha studio again I dont know how to fix it.

Yes, you have to get rid of Gacha Club edition/Gacha want the old ver I can not fix it this time.

I will put up the old version of gacha club mod when its asked for.

Enjoy!

P.S: You're beautiful every part of you is beautiful, dont let people change the way you are.
